name: Little Christmas Town
description:
This project was made for MigJam #4 in around 12 days. This is a Christmas themed game where a small town has lost it's Christmas spirit. Move around and sing using W, S, A, D or the arrow keys and sing to the town folk and find their lost items to restore happiness this holiday season.

Resources used:

ChipTone: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

BoscaCeoil: https://boscaceoil.net/

Snow crunch sounds:
https://freesound.org/people/mparsons99/sounds/94619/

https://freesound.org/people/max_b_jo/sounds/269856/

https://freesound.org/people/cmusounddesign/sounds/96163/

Path walking sound:
https://freesound.org/people/Unlistenable/sounds/414335/

https://freesound.org/people/straget/sounds/411206/

Twinkle pick up sound:

https://freesound.org/people/Chanhun/sounds/161322/

Using Christmas Sprite pack:
https://opengameart.org/content/christmas-village-asset-pack
